parameters.name: Category
parameters.description: The type of the template. Valid values include TimerTrigger, EventTrigger, AlarmTrigger, and Other.

parameters.name: CreatedBy
parameters.description:
The creator of the template.

*   To query the template provided by Alibaba Cloud, set this parameter to **ACS**.
*   To query the template created by a user, set this parameter to the **ID** of the template or the **name of the user** who creates the template.

parameters.name: CreatedDateAfter
parameters.description:
Specifies to query the template that is created at or later than the specified time.

The value must be in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format.

parameters.name: CreatedDateBefore
parameters.description:
Specifies to query the template that is created at or before the specified time.

The value must be in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm::ssZ format.

parameters.name: HasTrigger
parameters.description: Specifies whether to query the template that is configured with a trigger.

parameters.name: IsFavorite
parameters.description: The template is favorite or not.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 20 to 100. Default value: 50.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you want to query templates.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ShareType
parameters.description:
The share type of the template. Valid values:

*   **Public**
*   **Private**

parameters.name: SortField
parameters.description:
The field that is used to sort the templates to be queried. Valid values:

*   **TotalExecutionCount** (default): The system sorts the returned templates based on the total number of times that the templates are used.
*   **Popularity**: The system sorts the returned templates based on the popularity of the templates.
*   **TemplateName**: The system sorts the returned templates based on the names of the templates.
*   **CreatedDate**: The system sorts the returned templates based on the points in time when the templates are created.
*   **UpdatedDate**: The system sorts the returned templates based on the points in time when the templates are updated.

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the results. Valid values:

*   **Ascending**: ascending order.
*   **Descending**: descending order. This is the default value.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag keys and values. The number of key-value pairs ranges from 1 to 20.

parameters.name: TemplateFormat
parameters.description:
The format of the template. Valid values:

*   **JSON**
*   **YAML**

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template. All templates whose names contain the specified template name are to be returned.

parameters.name: TemplateType
parameters.description:
The type of the template. Valid values:

*   Automation: the template for automated tasks.
*   State: the template for configuration inventories.
*   Package: the template for software packages.
